name: WHILE THE WHOLE WORLD laughs
description:
She was alone in her room, drawing the night away. She could hear something faintly in the distance, it was music. She wondered where it was coming from. 

Draw the world into view to help her navigate it.

Hold the left mouse button to draw in the world.

Click the right mouse button to search for nearby lines that have not been drawn.

Click the left and right mouse buttons together if you get stuck, to briefly highlight all lines that have yet to be drawn.

If you enjoyed this game be sure to rate it, recommend it to your friends or leave a comment on what your feedback is. You may also be interested in reading the novel adapted from this game, neverdream, which can be found on our main page.
